Media vida 2 juego que debes probar si o si y mas con estas ofertas mamalonas del verano ahora sis a entrar con el juego.                                                                                                                                                                                   
Este juego como salio en 2004 fue una maravilla por sus grandes aspectos (Que yo considero no se si es por todos pq estoy bien menso) como El motor del videojuego (Source 1), Su historia, La jugabilidad que me encanta por el simple echo de restregarte en la cara que ocupas experimentar en ciertas fases del juego lo que ofrece el motor source como, nooombre pon mas barriles debajo del puente para aprovechar que estan vacios por adentro, y luego para levantarlo gracias al agua que tiene sumergido el puente y seguir con tu historia miadas, coloca unas cajas aqui para poder escapar por la ventana, columpiate pvto, entre otras pq aun no me acabo la historia pero ya se la soba el que lea este desmadre y que se haya completado el juego, y ya fin
2004年的作品，放到今天依然足够惊艳，不错的射击手感、解密的要素、逃亡恐怖的氛围，一切都营造渲染得恰到好处。G胖赶紧出半条命三吧。

эта игра хоть и была сделана в 2004 году,но она и до сих пор может удивить вас,и даже скоротать время,я поиграть в эту игру 5 часов,но могу сказать что халф-лайф 2 лучшая версия своих подопытных игр,а именно - half-life 1,и даже half-life episode 1 (2) 
всем советую эту игру если есть возможность преобрести ее.

Holds up amazingly for a game made in 2007, the environments and gameplay scenarios are really fun and a huge step up from Half Life 1. In my personal opinion it lacks in the world building department but it added a lot of interesting things to the lore of Half Life that I really like.
One thing I was a bit disappointed by is the lack of boss battles and enemy variety, in Half Life 1 you'd be getting attacked by Head Humpers and Zombies for the beginning and overtime you'd fight more enemies like the military soldiers and assassins. But in Half Life 2 you only fight combine soldiers and big ants, and the only boss battle there is (if you could call it one) would be a bigger ant lion. I think Half Life 2 makes up for it though with it's really fun level design and vehicles you can drive in big environments! I'd say that's the most enjoyable part.
I think in story it's a bit generic, you have a predictable plot twist and a villain that's evil kind of to be evil. I'm sure they build on it more in Episode 1 and 2 but they could've put more effort into it. They word-building was great in Half Life 1 and in Half Life 2 it's more exposition.
The Gameplay is really fun and I had a blast switching to different guns and using the gravity gun to pick up shit and throw it at enemies, huge step up from Half Life 1 and it just flows.
As a sequel to Half Life 1 I'd say it didn't really meet my expectations but that doesn't stop it from being a really good game, even with some of it's flaws and short comings I'd give it a 7/10. Definitely  worth the buy

Rise and shine, Mister Freeman, rise and… shine. Not that I wish… to imply that you have been sleeping on… the job. No one is more deserving of a rest, and all the effort in the world would have gone to waste until… well… let's just say your hour has come again. The right man in the wrong place can make all the difference… in the world. So, wake up, Mister Freeman. Wake up and… smell the ashes.

Half-Life è una serie portante del genere degli fps, e se a più di 15 anni di distanza, ci sono ancora una massa di appassionati che lo osannano, un motivo ci sarà.

Avevo iniziato a giocare a questo gioco già con una discreta conoscenza del genere fps prima persona (dalle varie campagne cod, passando per metro fino a wolfenstein) pensavo di arrivare davanti a un gioco che non avesse oramai niente da offrire, dopo che le varie meccaniche erano ormai entrate nel genere da diverso 

Con queste premesse e con il fatto che tutta la serie viene tuttora buttata a poco più di un panino col salame fatto in bottega, ho iniziato a giocare ad Half-Life.

Non ho mai giocato a niente di simile nella mia vita. 
Dalle meccaniche all'uso delle mappe, alla trama, tutto mi sembrava rasentare la perfezione. 

Half-Life ha totalmente riformato il mio pensiero e giudizio sugli fps, e da allora è diventato un punto fermo di paragone. 
Pochi giochi tutt'ora possono vantare la rivoluzione che questo gioco ha fatto in questo genere e come pochi titoli fps, anche ai giorni nostri, possano vantare di avere il livello di qualità che questo gioco ha.

Spero di avervi convinto quindi di spendere non più di 11-12 ore del vostro tempo e due spiccioli per recuperare questa serie, così da essere frustati quanto me nel sapere che Newell non riesce a contare fino a tre per concludere una saga narrativamente tutt'altro che conclusa.

Half-Life was a great game, but the sequel quite honestly puts it to shame in comparison.

Literally every good thing in the original Half-Life returns here, and only adds onto the formula from there. You have all the classic weapons to use at your disposal and even more so. This game introduces all its mechanics to you extremely well, and they're all fun to use. With better looking worlds and memorable settings to travel through, and lots of well-developed characters to boot, this is what I can call a great expansion of the original [i]Half-Life.[/i] Speaking of the worlds, I just adore how every level and even chapter feel so connected, with loading screens barely even affecting the pacing at all! It's one continuous adventure without intermissions, and I think that's fantastic. Even the achievements are for the most part pretty fair and fun to get.

This is one of the best, if not [i]the[/i] best FPS game I've played so far. The best part is, I'm only 1/3 of the way there! I still have two games to play, and I'm super excited to see where this tale leads next. It goes without saying, but this is a [i]Steam must-buy.[/i]

This game gets my subjective score of [b]9/10.[/b]
